member.name: T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid
member.summary: Represents a cryptographic object identifier. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Oid)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified object.
member.param: The object identifier information to use to create the new object identifier.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using a string value of an object.
member.param: An object identifier.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified value and friendly name.
member.param: The dotted number of the identifier.
The friendly name of the identifier.

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.FriendlyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the friendly name of the identifier.
member.returns: The friendly name of the identifier.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.FromFriendlyName(System.String,System.Security.Cryptography.OidGroup)
member.summary: Creates an object from an OID friendly name by searching the specified group.
member.returns: An object that represents the specified OID.
member.param: The friendly name of the identifier.
The group to search in.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.FromOidValue(System.String,System.Security.Cryptography.OidGroup)
member.summary: Creates an object by using the specified OID value and group.
member.returns: A new instance of an object.
member.param: The OID value.
The group to search in.
member.exception: The friendly name for the OID value was not found.

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the dotted number of the identifier.
member.returns: The dotted number of the identifier.
